problems: You don't know which menu items actually make money

Reports are slow, complicated, or sit in someone else's tool
outcomes: See item-level margins and profit instantly
Spot "winners" and "profit leaks" at a glance

contributingMargin.title: Contributing Margin â€” The Real Profit Story
contributingMargin.subtitle: See beyond gross profit to understand what each dish truly contributes to your business
contributingMargin.example: PrepFlow helps you see: That $15 burger might have a 60% GP, but after prep time, waste, and complexity, it might only be contributing $2.50 to your bottom line. Meanwhile, that simple $8 side dish might be contributing $4.00.
contributingMargin.disclaimer: *Example for illustration - actual results depend on your specific menu and costs

myStory.title: My Journey Creating PrepFlow
myStory.subtitle: This isn't just another tool - it's my personal solution to real kitchen problems, refined over 20 years of working in restaurants across Europe and Australia.

2008-2012.title: 2008-2012 - Early Experience
2008-2012.description: Started as Sous Chef at Krautwells GmbH, managing vegan cuisine and training junior chefs

2012-2018.title: 2012-2018 - European Leadership
2012-2018.description: Founded KSK-KÃ¼chenspezialkrÃ¤fte vegan catering, managed teams of 21 staff, served 1,200+ daily

2018-2024.title: 2018-2024 - Australian Excellence
2018-2024.description: Executive Chef roles, Head Chef at ALH Hotels, leading teams of 9 chefs with AI integration

2024.title: 2024 - Ready to Share
2024.description: Now sharing the perfected tool with fellow chefs and restaurateurs who face the same challenges I did

whyCreated.title: Why I Created PrepFlow
paragraphs: Over 20 years as a chef, I've managed everything from small cafÃ©s to large-scale catering operations serving 1,200+ guests daily. I've faced the same challenges you do: menu costing, waste management, profitability analysis, and team efficiency.

As Head Chef at ALH Hotels, I was constantly looking for better ways to manage costs, streamline prep systems, and optimize our menu mix. Existing solutions were either too complex, too expensive, or didn't understand real kitchen operations.

So I built my own solution - a simple Google Sheets template that could handle COGS calculations, track ingredient costs, and show me exactly which menu items were profitable and which were losing money.

Having worked across Europe and Australia, I've refined it to work perfectly for venues worldwide - with GST support for Australian markets, multi-currency options, and the flexibility to adapt to any kitchen's needs. It's the tool I wish I had when I started, and now I'm sharing it with you.

stockList.title: Stock List (infinite)
stockList.description: Centralise ingredients with pack size, unit, supplier, storage, product code. Capture trim/waste and yields to get true cost per unit.

cogsRecipes.title: COGS Recipes
cogsRecipes.description: Build recipes that autoâ€‘pull ingredient costs (incl. yield/trim). See dish cost, COGS%, GP$ and GP% instantly.

itemPerformance.title: Item Performance
itemPerformance.description: Paste sales. We calculate popularity, profit margin, total profit exâ€‘GST and classify items as Chef's Kiss, Hidden Gem or Bargain Bucket.

dashboardKPIs.title: Dashboard KPIs
dashboardKPIs.description: At a glance: average GP%, food cost %, average item profit and sale price, plus top performers by popularity and margin.

globalTaxCurrency.title: Global Tax & Currency
globalTaxCurrency.description: Set country, tax system (GST/VAT/Sales Tax), and currency in Settings. All outputs adapt to your local market requirements.

fastOnboarding.title: Fast Onboarding

aiMethodGenerator.description: Discover new cooking methods that could improve your margins and reduce waste. Get AI-powered suggestions for optimizing your kitchen processes.

techSkills.question: Do I need tech skills?
techSkills.answer: Zero spreadsheet formulas required. If you can use Google Sheets, you're good.

worldwide.question: Does it work worldwide?
worldwide.answer: Built for global venues â€” includes GST, VAT, Sales Tax toggles, multi-currency support, and export-ready reports for any market.

satisfaction.question: What if it doesn't work for me?
satisfaction.answer: If you're not satisfied with the insights and clarity PrepFlow provides in 7 days, you'll get every cent back. No hassle.

speed.question: Will this slow me down?
speed.answer: Setup typically takes 1-2 hours. After that, you'll save time on menu planning and cost analysis.
